mapper.select: SELECT P.BBS_NO , P.POST_NO , P.POST_TITLE , IFNULL(R.REPLY_CNT, 0) REPLY_CNT , L.NICKNAME WRT_NM , DATE_FORMAT(P.WRT_DTT, '%Y-%m-%d') WRT_DTT , P.REPLY_YN , P.VIEW_CNT , IFNULL(O.LIKE_CNT, 0) LIKE_CNT , COUNT(*) OVER() TOT_CNT FROM POST P JOIN UNI_LOGIN L ON P.WRT_ID = L.LOGIN_NO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT BBS_NO , POST_NO , COUNT(*) REPLY_CNT FROM REPLY WHERE 1 = 1 AND BBS_NO = #{bbsNo} GROUP BY BBS_NO , POST_NO ) R ON P.BBS_NO = R.BBS_NO AND P.POST_NO = R.POST_NO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT BBS_NO , POST_NO , COUNT(*) LIKE_CNT FROM OBJ_LIKE WHERE 1 = 1 AND OBJ_CL_CD = '101100' AND BBS_NO = #{bbsNo} GROUP BY BBS_NO , POST_NO ) O ON P.BBS_NO = O.BBS_NO AND P.POST_NO = O.POST_NO WHERE 1 = 1 AND P.BBS_NO = #{bbsNo} AND P.POST_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{qs}, '%') ORDER BY POST_NO DESC

SELECT P.BBS_NO , P.POST_NO , P.POST_TITLE , PC.CONTENTS , IFNULL(O.LIKE_CNT, 0) LIKE_CNT , P.VIEW_CNT , P.WRT_ID , L.NICKNAME WRT_NM , P.DISP_YN , P.REPLY_YN , DATE_FORMAT(P.WRT_DTT, '%Y-%m-%d') WRT_DTT FROM POST P JOIN UNI_LOGIN L ON P.WRT_ID = L.LOGIN_NO LEFT JOIN POST_CONTENTS PC ON P.BBS_NO = PC.BBS_NO AND P.POST_NO = PC.POST_NO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT BBS_NO , POST_NO , COUNT(*) LIKE_CNT FROM OBJ_LIKE WHERE 1 = 1 AND OBJ_CL_CD = '101100' AND BBS_NO = #{bbsNo} AND POST_NO = #{postNo} GROUP BY BBS_NO , POST_NO ) O ON P.BBS_NO = O.BBS_NO AND P.POST_NO = O.POST_NO WHERE 1 = 1 AND P.POST_NO = #{postNo} AND P.BBS_NO = #{bbsNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE POST M JOIN POST S ON M.POST_NO = S.POST_NO AND M.BBS_NO = S.BBS_NO SET M.VIEW_CNT = S.VIEW_CNT + 1 WHERE M.POST_NO = #{postNo} AND M.BBS_NO = #{bbsNo}
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(MAX(POST_NO) + 1, 1) POST_NO FROM POST WHERE BBS_NO = #{bbsNo}
SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END LIKE_YN FROM OBJ_LIKE WHERE 1 = 1 AND LOGIN_NO = #{loginNo} AND OBJ_CL_CD = '101100' AND BBS_NO = #{bbsNo} AND POST_NO = #{postNo}

SELECT R.REPLY_NO , R.REPLY , R.WRT_ID , L.NICKNAME WRT_NM , DATE_FORMAT(R.WRT_DTT, '%Y-%m-%d %T') WRT_DTT FROM REPLY R , UNI_LOGIN L WHERE 1 = 1 AND R.BBS_NO = #{bbsNo} AND R.POST_NO = #{postNo} AND R.WRT_ID = L.LOGIN_NO ORDER BY REPLY_NO DESC
